backend/main.mo: Motoko canister managing user profiles with access control plus public inquiry creation and admin-only inquiry retrieval.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping features to related files, components, tests, and confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of multiple frontend files for quick reference.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind base styles defining color tokens, CSS variables, and dark-mode overrides.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML document mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up TanStack Router with public site routes and admin routes protected by AdminGuard.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminGuard: Checks Internet Identity authentication and admin role before rendering protected children.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Login/logout button wired to Internet Identity with state handling and query cache clearing.
frontend/src/components/inquiry/InquiryF: Validated inquiry submission form with client-side checks, success/error states, and backend mutation.
frontend/src/components/inquiry/inquiryM: Formats inquiry form data into subject/body fields and assigns backend MessageType.inquiry.
Renders the site footer with company info, quick links, and a copyright notice using Lucide icons.
Implements a responsive header with navigation links, logo, login button, and mobile menu sheet.
Wraps pages with a consistent layout including header, footer, and main content area.
frontend/src/components/site/ThemeCard.t: Provides a styled card component with optional title, description, and custom content.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages the backend actor instance based on Internet Identity and refreshes dependent queries.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Handles authentication via Internet Identity, exposing identity state, login, logout, and status helpers.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for fetching and mutating user profiles, roles, and inquiries through the actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Configures Tailwind styles and defines a custom industrial-themed color palette and utilities.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Initializes the app root, setting up React Query and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/src/pages/AboutPage.tsx: Renders the About page with mission, values, and themed content sections using ThemeCard components.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminInquiriesP: Lists and manages submitted inquiries with loading/error states, sorting, and navigation to individual inquiry details.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminInquiryDet: Displays detailed information for a single inquiry with submitter data, message body, and navigation back to the inquiries list.
frontend/src/pages/ContactPage.tsx: Renders a contact page with header, contact info, and an inquiry form using ThemeCard and InquiryForm components.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Defines the homepage with a hero section, call‑to‑action buttons, feature cards, and promotional content for aluminum trading.
frontend/src/pages/TradingPage.tsx: Provides trading information including material categories and a step‑by‑step overview of the trading process using multiple ThemeCard sections.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for reading, storing, persisting, and clearing URL and session parameters, including support for hash‑based routing.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS config enabling dark mode, custom fonts, colors, animations, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Project state file describing existing features, pending requests, project metadata, and required generated images for the ARDEE INDUSTRIES website.
